medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.description: Used to relieve pain and reduce fever. It has minimal anti-inflammatory properties.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take with or without food. Avoid alcohol to prevent liver damage.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce pain, inflammation, and fever.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take with food or milk to avoid stomach upset. Do not exceed recommended dose.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Used for pain relief, anti-inflammatory purposes, and to reduce fever.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take with a full glass of water. Avoid if allergic to NSAIDs.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: Antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take with or without food. Complete full course to avoid resistance.

medicines.name: Ciprofloxacin
medicines.description: Antibiotic effective for treating infections, especially of the urinary tract.
medicines.usage_instructions: Avoid dairy and antacids. Take with plenty of water.

medicines.name: Cetirizine
medicines.description: Antihistamine used for relief of allergy symptoms like runny nose and itching.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take once daily. Avoid alcohol and activities requiring alertness.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.description: Used to control blood sugar levels in patients with type 2 diabetes.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take with meals to reduce stomach upset. Do not crush or chew extended-release tablets.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.description: Proton pump inhibitor used to reduce stomach acid for conditions like GERD.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take before meals. Avoid long-term use without medical advice.

medicines.name: Simvastatin
medicines.description: Used to lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take in the evening. Avoid grapefruit products.

medicines.name: Losartan
medicines.description: Used to treat high blood pressure and protect the kidneys from diabetes damage.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take at the same time each day. Avoid potassium supplements.

medicines.name: Levothyroxine
medicines.description: Synthetic thyroid hormone used to treat hypothyroidism.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take on an empty stomach, 30 minutes before breakfast.

medicines.name: Amlodipine
medicines.description: Calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take at the same time each day, with or without food.

medicines.name: Clopidogrel
medicines.description: Antiplatelet drug used to prevent blood clots in heart disease.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take at the same time each day. Avoid activities that could cause injury.

medicines.name: Metoprolol
medicines.description: Beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure, chest pain, and heart issues.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take with food. Do not skip doses as it may worsen heart conditions.

medicines.name: Furosemide
medicines.description: Diuretic used to reduce excess fluid in the body and lower blood pressure.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take in the morning to avoid frequent urination at night.

medicines.name: Warfarin
medicines.description: Anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots.
medicines.usage_instructions: Take at the same time each day. Avoid foods high in vitamin K.
